description:
Azure is redefining what is possible with technology—creating unprecedented possibilities to solve humanity’s most complex challenges. Our team combines hardware innovation with software technologies and Azure services to build innovative solutions to solve seemingly intractable problems.

Advances in materials have preceded almost every technology leap. Discovering new materials has been one of the most challenging and crucial problems for the advancement of society. In our team, we are developing state-of-the-art machine learning solutions for material design.

Do you have a passion for science and technology and new application opportunities offered by breakthroughs in compute technology? Join our team to develop the next generation material science solutions.

The job provides an opportunity to:
• Work at the forefront of computing and intelligence for materials science.
• Work in a world class engineering team of engineers, researchers, architects, and leadership that will help you grow your career.

We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Specialist - Materials. You’ll be collaborating with a world class team across various disciplines and driving impact on the future of computing within the team and with customers and partners.

Responsibilities
• Work with material scientists to design data infrastructure and pipelines for materials data.
• Develop machine learning solutions for material science and launch them to real-world applications.
• Work with partners and customers to create industry-defining breakthroughs.

Qualifications
• Master’s degree in Materials Science, Chemistry, Physics, or relevant field.
• 3+ years of industry experience within materials science or computational chemistry or machine learning or relevant field
• Demonstrated experience with applications of machine learning for materials science.
• Strong engineering skills for machine learning application development.
• Experience with large scale material data processing.
• Demonstrable ability to work in a multi-disciplinary team.

MICROSOFT BACKGROUND CHECK:

Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role. These requirements include, but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings: Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud Background Check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.
